description: This file defines the BooleanVariable class, which extends BaseVariable, representing a boolean variable for code generation purposes. It includes methods for encoding and decoding boolean values to/from JSON and native code, and specifies the type mappings and JSON key used.

classes.name: BooleanVariable
classes.description: Represents a boolean variable with methods for encoding/decoding and type information, extending BaseVariable.

methods.name: <constructor>
methods.description: Constructs a BooleanVariable instance using an ICBoolVariable bean.

methods.name: resolveReferences
methods.description: Resolves references within the variable; empty implementation.

methods.name: isBoolean
methods.description: Returns true indicating this variable is of boolean type.

methods.name: getJsonKey
methods.description: Returns the JSON key associated with boolean variables.

methods.name: getNativeEncodeLines
methods.description: Generates native C code lines to encode the boolean value into JSON.

methods.name: getNativeDecodeLines
methods.description: Generates native C code lines to decode the boolean value from JSON.

methods.name: getJavaEncodeLines
methods.description: Generates Java code lines to encode the boolean value into a JSON object.

methods.name: getJavaDecodeLines
methods.description: Generates Java code lines to decode the boolean value from a JSON object.

methods.name: getJavaIpcObjectType
methods.description: Returns the Java IPC object type name associated with this variable.
